attributes.action: Demand DfT Give Leicester an Improved Cross Country Service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the moment we Have No Cross Country Services diagrammed Through Leicester, This is unacceptable for such a large city, When Cross country will go Through Leicester in November We Demand that we Have anglo-scottish Services Diagrammed as well, Especially as the MML will be the First mainline for many European Tourist on the CTRL, at the Moment we have to change at Derby Or Birmingham, both of which are overcrowded at the moment.
